item.description:
Looking for an opportunity to practice your German? Come to a meetup with an international flair!
No formal presentations or homework! Just come join us for Kaffee und Kuchen and chat. Whether you have learned German in Germany or have studied it in college, high school or on your own, welcome! Let's have another lively meetup. Please come prepared to have a fun and interesting evening speaking with German speakers from all over the world! We are planning to meet on the first and third Thursdays of each month so in June it will be June 7th and 21st..
Dianne
Note: If you Mapquest Panera, it might send you to the wrong place! It is at Bishop's Corner Shopping Center, next to Staples, intersection of Routes 44 & 218.
item.name: The West Hartford German Language June Meetup
